body:

lol, you are projecting my dear filthy dem supporter.

Also, who made the thumbnail is a fucking cuck clickbaiter. the translated title is ''impregnated mother'' and the preview shows a mom and her son on it. One would expect an incest story, but then he gets this horrible bestiality nigger shit.
